arts.ttl: A new Celtic buzzword emerges as Brendan Rodgers wants more GREED after rare misfire at Tannadice
arts.sum: Misfires in front of goal have been a rarity and Rodgers was reluctant to be too harsh after a stunning six months

arts.ttl: Dundee United's Declan Gallagher makes claim about Celtic's style of play in windy conditions
arts.sum: In the first half, Dundee United were playing against the wind and it meant that they were struggling to keep Celtic away from their goal. “It was a tough ask, but the boys dug in well and I think the second half, we came into it a little bit more and we know fine well that Celtic will just dominate possession.

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers explains four Celtic starting line-up changes vs Dundee United with key injury updates
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers’ injury update on Celtic duo Nicolas Kuhn and Alistair Johnston But before Celtic face Rangers at Ibrox, Rodgers has fixtures against Motherwell and St Johnstone to negotiate before the big Glasgow Derby and with four players missing today, the Hoops boss has shared an update on the key players missing from the Tannadice draw.

arts.ttl: Rangers get hammered and 5 star Celtic pounce as Leanne Crighton dishes out history lesson on who the REAL winners are
arts.sum: Rangers were thrashed 3-0 by Hibs and Celtic pounced with a rampant five goal win

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca admits £20m player could be 'thinking of leaving' Chelsea amid links to Celtic
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca admits Carney Chukwuemeka might ‘want to leave’ Chelsea amid Celtic links But it seems that one player who has been linked to Celtic recently could very well be on the move after Enzo Maresca admitted he will ‘try to find a solution’ his £20m man’s unhappiness at being left out of his Chelsea team.

arts.ttl: The Celtic trio fans are sending Brendan Rodgers a clear message about after Dundee United draw
arts.sum: Kyogo Furuhashi has been off it for a number of weeks and whilst the criticism of the Celtic striker is nowhere near what it is for Yang and Palma, fans do have a message for Rodgers about the talismanic striker. Celtic boss Brendan Rodgers didn’t his disappointment about dropping points at Dundee United but he was fair and rational with his verdict on the result.

arts.ttl: What Rodgers really thinks about Celtic draw with Dundee Utd as pundits spot 3 things he won't say out loud
arts.sum: Rodgers was frustrated but far from furious as his team lurched to a point at Tannadice

arts.ttl: With chat of an 'off-white' Celtic third kit incoming, I'd take this belter right now
arts.sum: Celtic are in-line for a 'never before seen' third kit next year, this concept kit is a beauty

arts.ttl: Chris Sutton shuts down 'hysterical' Rangers fan's 'narrative' about Celtic's League Cup win
arts.sum: The reaction to Celtic’s League Cup win and the Rangers penalty controversy continues this weekend as Chris Sutton has his say on the VAR dispute. Willie Collum broke his silence on the Celtic/Rangers penalty furore after he admitted the Ibrox club should have been awarded a spot-kick after VAR officials missed Liam Scales fouling Vaclav Cerny inside the box.

arts.ttl: Jim Goodwin silences Celtic-daft mates as Dundee United boss reveals 2 key factors in battling draw
arts.sum: Goodwin has plenty of Celtic supporting family and friends and he's happy to have shut them up
